Title: Prohibits the sale of entertainment vapor products
Summary: Prohibits the sale of entertainment vapor products, or any vapor product that has bluetooth, wireless internet, or other internet connectivity, or the ability to play virtual games, play music, or display photos or other animations on the device.
LawCode: Add ยง1399-ll-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of entertainment vapor products
